gaia::content::IApplicationPreferencesChangeListener Class Reference

virtual void onPreferenceChanged (const ApplicationPreferences &preference, const base::String &key)=0
 Called when a ApplicationPreferences is changed, added, or removed.

Detailed Description

virtual class definition for a callback to be invoked when a ApplicationPreferences is changed.

The following example demonstrates how to use the IApplicationPreferencesChangeListener

 // MyListener.h

 class MyListener : public IApplicationPreferencesChangeListener {
 public:
     MyListener();
     virtual ~MyListener();
     void onPreferenceChanged(const ApplicationPreferences& preference, const string& key);
 };


 // MyListener.cpp

 void MyListener::onPreferenceChanged(const ApplicationPreferences& preference, const string& key) {

     // .... do something
     if(0 == strcmp(key.string(), "bool_key")) {
         bool bool_value = preference.getBool(key, false)
     }

 }


 // MyPage.cpp

 void MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState){

     // new Content instance
     Context* context = new Context(this);

     // Get ApplicationPreferences instance
     content::ApplicationPreferences* preference =
         context->getApplicationPreferencesN(content::ApplicationPreferences::MODE_ALL_WRITE);

     // new a PreferencesTestListener instance
     PreferencesTestListener* listener = new PreferencesTestListener();

     // set Listener
     preference->setListener(listener);

     // ...

 }

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::content::IApplicationPreferencesChangeListener::onPreferenceChanged ( const ApplicationPreferences &  preference,
const base::String &  key 
) [pure virtual]

Called when a ApplicationPreferences is changed, added, or removed.

This may be called even if a preference is set to its existing value.

Parameters:
[in]preferenceApplicationPreferences The that received the change
[in]keyThe key of the preference that was changed, added, or removed.
